Hack Night Lancaster

A night of coding for a cause!


Find Out More

Hack Night is ready for your next project!

Lancaster's local technology talent is eager to use their skills on projects for local non-profits.

Our Goals

CoWorking

If you are looking for a side project to hack on or need a second pair of eyes on your project then hack night is for you!

Advice & Knowledge

Have questions that online forums just can't answer? Come to hack night to pick the brain of fellow developers.

Help Local Non-Profits

Hack Night is attempting to pair local technology talent with local non-profits to help those organizations most in need.

Experimentation

Want help learning a new framework? Want to break something where people can help fix it? Hack Night will help.
